alert.note: Alert for Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:30PM CDT until April 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WARREN...NORTHWESTERN HINDS AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brownsville, or 13 miles northwest of Clinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bolton and Brownsville around 540 PM CDT. Flora around 550 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
